description:
Employing the bene ts of our Firstlight insulation with panels of blended 
merino wool in key areas, the Firstlight Hybrid Hoody combines a range 
of  eld-proven materials into a incredibly breathable and versatile 
midlayer.
name: Black Diamond First Light Hybrid Hoody - Mens

specs.value: Schoeller® stretch-woven nylon with Eco-Repel Bio® PFC-Free DWR Technology (80 gsm, 93% nylon, 7% Elastane)
PrimaLoft® Silver Insulation Active (60 gsm, 100% polyester)
Blended merino wool (300 gsm, 100% nylon face, 100% merino wool backer)
